shelfButtonInfos.label: Cleanup Scene
shelfButtonInfos.command: from takTools.utils import globalUtil;import imp;imp.reload(globalUtil); globalUtil.cleanupMayaScene()
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Remove unknown nodes, plugins, callbacks, scriptjobs

shelfButtonInfos.label: Clear Output Window
shelfButtonInfos.command:
from takTools.utils import system as sysUtil
import imp
imp.reload(sysUtil)

sysUtil.clearOutputWindow()

shelfButtonInfos.label: Icon Browser
shelfButtonInfos.command:
import takTools.pipeline.takMayaResourceBrowser as tmrb

tmrb.TakMayaResourceBrowser.showUI()

shelfButtonInfos.label: Icon Maker
shelfButtonInfos.command:
from takTools.common import iconMaker
import imp
imp.reload(iconMaker)

gui = iconMaker.IconMakerGUI()
gui.show()

shelfButtonInfos.label: Save Scene Info

shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Save specific scene information as a file.
